name: Roll A Ball (ShovelingBear)
description:
University Homework for Semester 2 - Make a Roll a Ball game in the unity engine

Feel free to download and play.

Roll around a field collecting the yellow pick-ups, after you collect all 12. 

You win!

Please press the X in the top corner of the window to close the game when you win

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys - Roll
